alert.note: Alert for Calloway; Marshall; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 6:59AM EDT until July 19 at 7:45AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Calloway County in western Kentucky... Southeastern Marshall County in western Kentucky... Southwestern Trigg County in western Kentucky... * Until 645 AM CDT. * At 558 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Birmingham Ferry Recreation Area, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 550 AM, trained spotters reported 1.25 inch hail in Grand Rivers. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Energy Lake Campground, Turkey Bay, Land Between The Lakes Area, Golden Pond Visitors Center, Wranglers Campground, Canton and Aurora. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
